entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as the one who cast a curse on Malfoy, causing wounds. He is also mentioned to be soaked in blood and water.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is described as the one who performed an incantation that sounded like a song, and then repeated his spell to counter-curse Malfoy's wounds.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is mentioned as the victim of Harry's curse, with wounds that Snape tries to heal.

entities.name: myrtle
entities.description: Myrtle is described as sobbing and wailing overhead, indicating her presence in the bathroom.

entities.name: hospital wing
entities.description: The hospital wing is mentioned as a place where Malfoy needs to go for treatment.

entities.name: dittany
entities.description: Dittany is mentioned as something that might help avoid scarring if taken immediately.

relationships.description: Snape performs a counter-curse to heal Malfoy's wounds.
Harry cast a curse that injured Malfoy.
Snape suggests taking dittany to avoid scarring.
Malfoy needs to go to the hospital wing for treatment.
